article.title: Has DOD transformed enough?
article.abstract: A Tough Scorecard for Transformation By Cmdr. Gregory E. Glaros, USN (Ret.)
article.text: The Defense Department has had a great deal to be proud of: superior technology in the hands of unmatched leadership and training. No military has possessed a more transformed force. So why are we in such trouble today?Why is there such a constant stream of criticism of the department and its leadership? Did the political gains of the last election drive the negative backlash? Is the threat environment too challenging and the enemy an even match for our forces? Perhaps the Defense Department has not transformed enough? Â
